text: DJ Khaled and Kendrick Lamar topped this year ’ s BET Awards nominations, with six and five nods, respectively, including video of the year, best collaboration, and album of the year. Lamar has two noms in the album category for both his solo effort “ DAMN. ” and “ Black Panther : The Album, ” which he spearheaded. DJ Khaled also has a record in the race with “ Grateful, ” plus more nominations for his collaborative work with Rihanna, Bryson Tiller, Jay - Z, Future, and Beyonce, as well as his video for “ Wild Thoughts. ” Lamar was also recognized for his collaboration with Rihanna on “ Loyalty ” and the video for “ Humble. ” Both are also up for best male hip
